name: SkillsSuggestions
0:
”Alexa open send suggestion”
”Alexa tell Send Suggestion I need a skill useful for me”
”I dream of having a Skill that is useful for me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: send suggestion
des: You need a skill and you can't find it on the store? Send us the description of it and if it's good we'll make it for you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
